Get ranges of the bounding box margins

Source: R/plot.R
dot-getRanges.Rd

Get ranges of the bounding box margins

Usage

.getRanges(expand = 1.03, ranges = par3d("bbox"))

Arguments

expand

Expand margins.

ranges

The bounding box.

Value

A list with ranges.
